meanings.definition: The quality or state of being immense.
meanings.sent1: The immenseness of the mountain took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The immenseness of the ocean was both beautiful and intimidating.
meanings.sent3: The immenseness of the cake was so overwhelming that we had to share it with the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The immenseness of the task ahead seemed like a mountain impossible to climb.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes widened in awe at the immenseness of the starry sky above.

meanings.definition: The vastness or enormity of something.
meanings.sent1: The immenseness of the desert stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent2: The immenseness of the forest made it easy to get lost in its depths.
meanings.sent3: The immenseness of the ice cream sundae was a delightful challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: The immenseness of her love for him was like an ocean with no shores.
meanings.sent5: The immenseness of the universe made her feel small yet connected to everything around her.
